name: Develer
tag_list: python, nokia-qt, c, django, embedded, bertos, firmware, linux, agile, extreme-programming
overview:
Develer plc is a company with interests in electronic projects software development and technology consultation business. We provide custom projects for many different clients; these include medical and industry automation market. We are located in Italy but we work with clients all over Europe.

In all our partnerships we configure ourseves like a real technology partner. Our developing process involves clients in all steps, from requirements to final tests.

Develer have a strong infrastructure for software project management; clients can trace all our team’s working activities and control our development costs in real time. We are one of the few companies that adopt this particular methodology of development in Italy.

We are also investing in R&D to improve our staff’s skills in most of the modern technologies in software development. We believe that our human resources are our best competitive advantage in the modern software’s market.

In all our projects you can find some business benefits like transparency of the processes, an open architecture and the use of multi-platform technologies that allow you to improve your business in any software market.
